ObjTextEntries.textEntry: Signed and dated lower right:  Geza Kende, 1936 (also on reverse of stretcher)
Two labels on reverse:  Artist's name, title, numbered #13 and inscribed &quot;Federal Art Project&quot;; second label indicates the painting has been restored by Rash Gallery

Framed in an unfinished molded frame measuring 28 1/4" (H) x 34" (W).  The painting depicts a farmhouse behind rows of growing melons, with mountains in the distance.

Condition:  Overall very good.  The frame is separated from the canvas, otherwise very good.
